formats","script":"from datetime import date today = date.today() # dd/mm/YY d1 = today.strftime("%d/%m/%Y") print("d1 =", d1) # Textual month, day and year d2 = today.strftime("%B %d, %Y") print("d2 =", d2) # mm/dd/y d3 = today.strftime("%m/%d/%y") print("d3 =", d3) # Month abbreviation, day and year d4 = today.strftime("%b-%d-%Y") print("d4 =", properties.description:
Imports/ Exports 3 workflows
1. Python workflow with blocks
2. WF with All Logic Blocks
3. Table adapter Workflow

Import a workflow Scenario
1.	Importing Workflow using JSON 
2.	Sleep interval 65 seconds to complete import
3.	Once WF got imported, verifies import status (Success/failure)
4.	Then Validates WF’s to execution
5.	After validation. WF Execution will start
6.	Once execution started, verifies the run status (will be in the created state)
7.	Sleeps 65 seconds to completes the execution
8.	Once execution got completed, Makes GET instance API call to verify Status
9.	Then Delete the Instance and will do validation

Export Workflow Scenario
1.	Exports Workflow using JSON
2.	Sleep interval 65 seconds to complete export
3.	Verifies Export status 
4.	Does validation for export
5.	Delete Workflow
6.	Will do Final validation for both import and export

Validation
Import a WF
Verifying Import WF status (Success/Failure)
Execute Import WF
Verify Run status
Delete Workflow
Export Wf validation
Run WF Verify
